title: beach side land for sale
details:
This stunning piece of land is located in THALPE,galle road.

It is perfectly set on 30 perches on land.

This land is located in infront of beach.(beach side) you can se the photos.

It is very close to thalpe railway station.

Thalpe beach is still a very quiet place and a perfect location to enjoy.

However,it is only have to 5km galle town to this place.

Only this place have to sale in thalpe beach side. its 170 million
